sense.def:
To open something
pomeni premakniti nekaj, na primer vrata ali pokrov škatle, tako da ne zapira več odprtine ali vrzeli. Kadar nekaj
opens
, se premakne tako, da nič več ne pokriva odprtine ali vrzeli.

seg.quote: Elizabeth opened the door and went in.
The door opened almost before Brody had finished knocking.
...the open window.

sense.def:
To open a cupboard, container, or letter
pomeni premakniti, odstraniti ali odrezati del omare, posode ali pisma, tako da lahko tisto, kar je noter, vzamemo ven.

seg.quote: Open the tool-box.
I opened a can of beans.
He tore open the envelope.

sense.def:
To open a book
pomeni razpreti knjigo, da jo lahko beremo ali pišemo vanjo.

seg.quote: He opened the book at random.
...the open Bible.

sense.def:
To open one's mouth
pomeni razpreti ustnice in zobe.
One's mouth opens
, kadar se človekove ustnice in zobje razprejo.

seg.quote: She opened her mouth to say something, then closed it.
Angelica looked at me with her mouth open.

sense.def:
To open one's eyes
pomeni razpreti veke, tako da lahko gledamo.
One's eyes open
, kadar se veke razprejo, tako da tista oseba lahko gleda.

seg.quote: She opened her eyes and looked at me.
...lying with his eyes wide open.

sense.def:
To have an open mind
ali
to be open to ideas or suggestions
pomeni biti pripravljen pretehtati vsakršno zamisel ali predlog.

Kdor je
open
, je pošten in ne poskuša prikriti ničesar.

seg.quote: They looked at her with open curiosity.
...their relaxed openness.

sense.def:
Kadar je oseba, zamisel ali sistem
open to criticism or blame
, ga je mogoče kritizirati ali kriviti.

seg.quote: The proposals were certainly open to criticism.

sense.def:
Kadar trgovina, pisarna ali javna ustanova
opens
ali
is opened
, se njena vrata odklenejo in ljudje v njej začnejo delati.

seg.quote: When does the library open?
The Tate Gallery is open 10 a.m.—6 p.m.

sense.def:
Kadar pomembna oseba
opens a building or a public area
, uradno izjavi, da je ustanova ali območje nared za uporabo ali začetek delovanja.

seg.quote: Lord Shawcross declared the hotel open.
...the opening of the new theatre.

sense.def:
Kadar neki dogodek, na primer konferenca ali gledališka igra,
opens
, se začne.

seg.quote: The UN General Assembly opens in New York later this month.
...the opening of ‘Nicholas Nickleby’ on Broadway.

sense.def:
To open an event
pomeni kot prvi spregovoriti ali nekaj narediti na prireditvi.

seg.quote: Senator Denton opened the hearing by reminding us of our duty.

sense.def:
To open an account with a bank
pomeni začeti uporabljati usluge neke banke in ji dati nekaj denarja, da skrbi zanj ali ga kam vloži.

Kadar vrata ali soba
opens into or onto a place
, skozi vrata ali iz sobe lahko stopimo naravnost v drug prostor.

seg.quote: These rooms have doors opening directly onto the garden.

sense.def:
Kadar cvetovi
open
, se razprejo njihovi cvetni listi.

Oblačilo, ki je
open
, ni zapeto.

seg.quote: ...an open black raincoat.
...an open-necked shirt.

sense.def:
Kadar je del kopnega ali morja
open
, je prostran in je na njem malo stvari, na primer stavb ali otokov.

seg.quote: The road stretched across open country.
...the openness of Vincent Square.

sense.def:
Kar je
open
, ni pokrito ali zaprto.

seg.quote: ...an open car.
Never dry clothes in front of an open fire.

sense.def:
Kadar je potek dogajanj
open to someone
, zaradi njega človek lahko nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: We should use the opportunities now open to us.

sense.def:
Sestanek, tekmovanje ali povabilo je
open
, kadar lahko sodeluje kdorkoli.

seg.quote: Most Council meetings are open to the public.
...the Women's Open Golf Championship.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki položaj ali tema
open
, o njej še ni bil sprejet noben sklep.

seg.quote: I let joining the Party remain an open question.
They had left their options open.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj delamo
in the open
, tisto delamo zunaj hiše.

seg.quote: The children enjoyed sleeping out in the open.

sense.def:
Za okoliščine rečemo, da so
brought out into the open
, kadar ljudje zvedo zanje, tako da niso več skrivnost.

Kadar priložnost
opens up
ali
is opened up
, se nam ponudi.

seg.quote: All sorts of possibilities began to open up.

sense.def:
Kadar območje
opens up
ali
is opened up
, gredo ljudje laže tja ali laže trgujejo z njim.

seg.quote: Brunel opened up the West.

sense.def:
To open up a building
ali
to open up
pomeni odkleniti vrata stavbe, da ljudje lahko vstopijo.
